page.title: 04WHAT GIRLS DO.
page.content: In Julie and Helen's spare time they like to do things like climbing walls and then sitting up there talking .Sometimes they go to the village playing field and go on the swings and the slide.The roundabout is broken now. They like to practice gym doing things like handstands,headstands,rolls and cartwheels.Sometimes they fall out with each other and then play with other people-even the boys.If it is very hot we may buy an ice-cream from the village shop or maybe bike down to the coast at Southwold and go in the sea.On Tuesday's we go to Brownies and on Thursday we go to Youth Club.They are held in the Community Centre.On weekday we go to school (except in the holidays ).We start at 8-45 and finish at 3-00. We have dinner at 12-45.Mrs Stockdale cooks it in the school kitchen.Mr. Hayes is the Headmaster.
